title: Global Controllability of the Kawahara Equation at Any Time
abstract:
In this article, we prove that the nonlinear Kawahara equation on the
periodic domain \(\mathbb{T}\) (the unit circle in the plane) is globally
approximately controllable in \(H^s(\mathbb{T})\) for \(s \in \mathbb{N}\), at
any time \(T > 0\), using a two-dimensional control force. The proof is based
on the Agrachev-Sarychev approach in geometric control theory.
